statements: SELECT * FROM MarketFluctuations WHERE id = 1
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM MarketFluctuations ORDER BY stock_price DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketFluctuations WHERE market_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, stock_price FROM MarketFluctuations WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MarketFluctuations
SELECT id, stock_symbol, stock_price, market_date FROM MarketFluctuations WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY stock_price DESC, market_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM MarketFluctuations WHERE market_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY stock_price ASC, market_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, AVG(stock_price) AS average_price FROM MarketFluctuations GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(id) > 1 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT id, stock_symbol, stock_price, market_date FROM MarketFluctuations WHERE stock_symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL') AND market_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY stock_price ASC;
SELECT AVG(stock_price) AS average_price, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MarketFluctuations WHERE market_date = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM market_fluctuations WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT id, stock_name, market_price FROM market_fluctuations ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT stock_name, market_price FROM market_fluctuations WHERE market_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(id), risk_category FROM risk_assessment GROUP BY risk_category;
SELECT * FROM market_fluctuations WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND market_price > 100 ORDER BY market_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(market_price) AS avg_price FROM market_fluctuations GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(market_price) > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;

SELECT rf.stock_symbol, rf.stock_name, ra.risk_score, ra.risk_category FROM market_fluctuations rf JOIN risk_assessment ra ON rf.stock_symbol = ra.stock_symbol WHERE ra.risk_score > 8 ORDER BY rf.market_price DESC, ra.risk_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment ra INNER JOIN market_fluctuations mf ON ra.stock_symbol = mf.stock_symbol WHERE ra.risk_category = 'High Risk' ORDER BY mf.market_date ASC, ra.risk_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(stock_symbol), COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM market_fluctuations GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC, stock_symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, volume FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY volume ASC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM InvestmentAccounts WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT date, risk_score, recommendation FROM RiskAssessment ORDER BY date DESC, risk_score ASC;
SELECT date, symbol, price, volume FROM MarketData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT account_type, balance, customer_id FROM InvestmentAccounts WHERE balance < 50000 ORDER BY account_type, balance ASC;
SELECT symbol, volume, date FROM MarketData WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND volume > 100000 ORDER BY date, volume DESC;
SELECT account_id, risk_score, recommendation FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score >= 70 ORDER BY account_id ASC, risk_score DESC;
SELECT account_type, balance, customer_id FROM InvestmentAccounts WHERE account_type = 'Trading' AND balance > 100000 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM market_data WHERE stock_price > 100;
SELECT id, company_name, industry FROM company_info ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT * FROM investor_portfolio WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000;
SELECT id, trend_name, trend_type FROM market_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Industry';
SELECT id, stock_symbol, stock_price, market_cap FROM market_data WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, founding_year FROM company_info WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY founding_year;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount, stock_symbol FROM investor_portfolio WHERE investment_amount > 100000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Emerging' ORDER BY trend_name;
SELECT id, company_name, industry, founding_year FROM company_info WHERE founding_year > 2000 ORDER BY founding_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, stock_name, closing_price FROM MarketData WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' AND total_value > 100000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT account_number, portfolio_name, owner_name FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE owner_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY account_number;
SELECT currency_code, exchange_rate, last_updated FROM ExchangeRates WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0 ORDER BY exchange_rate;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_name, closing_price FROM MarketData WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT account_number, portfolio_name, owner_name FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE total_value > 100000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExchangeRates WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0 AND last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analyst_name, expertise_area FROM Analysts WHERE expertise_area LIKE '%Finance%' ORDER BY analyst_name ASC;
